original_text: I, even I, am he that comforteth you: who art thou, that thou shouldest be afraid of a man that shall die, and of the son of man which shall be made as grass;
korean_text: 이르시되 너희를 위로하는 자는 나 곧 나이니라 너는 어떠한 자이기에 죽을 사람을 두려워하며 풀 같이 될 사람의 아들을 두려워하느냐

sentences.original_text: I, even I, am he that comforteth you:
who art thou, that thou shouldest be afraid
of a man that shall die,
and of son of man which shall be made as grass;
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 풀 같이 될 인생을 두려워하느냐
